basics.name: Sreelakshmi Kutty
basics.label: Associate IT Analyst II
basics.summary: I am currently an Associate IT Analyst for HOCU, specializing in Cybersecurity and Help Desk management.

highlights: Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

work.summary: Provided technical support for the faculty, administration, and students of the three campuses
highlights: Provided technical support for hardware and software

work.summary: Managed and trained staff, communicated with parents, handled billing and payment software, assisted director with various tasks
highlights: Over 200 international students from Japan, South Korea, and China

work.company: St. Andrew's Schools - Priory School for Girls
work.summary: Taught students from grades 9-12 to the fundamentals of speech and debate
highlights: Students competed at the Hawaii Speech League tournaments

volunteer.summary: Assisted with saltwater and freshwater aquarium maintenance, led educational programs (onsite and outreach)
highlights: Helped develop new onsite aquaponics system

awards.title: 2nd Place in Environmental Engineering
awards.summary: Competed at the 2016 INTEL International Science and Engineering Fair in the Environmental Engineering Category with continuation of past research project

awards.title: 3rd Place in Chemistry
awards.summary: Qualified for and competed at the 2015 INTEL International Science and Engineering Fair in the Chemistry Category with research project: Novel Implementation of Chlorophytes and Rhodophytes
